Author: drinkpiss69420
Text: That sounds really disordered. Even though it’s better to get professionally diagnosed i think what separates disordered behavior and a full on eating disorder is that food and thoughts of food dominate most of a person w/ ED’s life, while a disordered eater often doesn’t think too much of it . I think itd be good for you to get help anyways even if you feel you aren’t sick enough or something because it could very well become an ED if it isn’t already, plus everybody deserves a good relationship with food :)
